TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PagerMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Represents the mode of the pager for accessing various pages within the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerMode> enumeration represents the different display modes for the pager of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control. NextPrev displays the pager controls using `Next` and `Previous` buttons; NumericPages displays numeric buttons representing the individual page numbers.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerMode NextPrev = int32(0)

Docs.summary: A pager with and buttons to access the next and previous pages.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerMode NumericPages = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A pager with numbered buttons to access pages directly.
